About Me
Contact

I hold a Bachelors degree in Computer Science and Engineering, graduating in 2022 from College of Engineering Trivandrum. My journey in the world of technology has been driven by an unwavering passion for Frontend Development and UI/UX Design & Development.

My pursuit of excellence in these fields has been shaped by a balanced blend of academic rigor and hands-on work experience. Through this combination, I have not only acquired essential skills but have also nurtured a deep-seated understanding of these domains. My commitment to learning and growth is unwavering, and I constantly seek opportunities to expand my knowledge.

My commitment to growth has led me through an enriching path. I have navigated a spectrum of freelance projects, each a unique voyage into diverse industries and business landscapes. This journey has not only fine-tuned my craft but also gifted me with priceless insights into the practical challenges of the real world.

As I continue on my journey in technology, I am excited to embrace new challenges, collaborate on innovative projects, and contribute my expertise to create remarkable digital experiences. My goal is to leverage my skills and experiences to drive positive impact and exceed expectations in every endeavor.
